title: ICE on overflow check for integral SIMD types

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
```
#![feature(core)]
use std::simd::u32x4;

fn main() {
    let a = u32x4(1,2,3,4);
    let b = u32x4(1,4,0,4);
    let c = a*b;
    println!("Res: {:?}", c);
}
```

```
rustc 1.0.0-nightly (123a754cb 2015-03-24) (built 2015-03-25)
```
